order_prep_delivery: Order is being prepared for delivery.
Order_received_processed: Order is received at Bosta warehouses and being processed.
Order_transferred: Order is being transferred to Bosta's Hubs.
Your order_created: Your order is created, Bosta will pick it up once your shipper is ready
order_returned_shipper: Order is returned back to the shipper
order_being_returned_shipper: Order is being returned to the shipper
Order_canceled_returned: Order is canceled and it will be returned back to the shipper
shipper_pickup: Your shipper requested a pickup. Bosta will pick it up soon
not_found: No record of this tracking number can be found at this time,please check the number and try again later. For further assistance, please contact Customer Service.
TICKET_CREATED: Your order is created, Bosta will pick it up once your shipper is ready
PACKAGE_RECEIVED: Order is received at Bosta warehouses and being processed.
IN_TRANSIT: Order is being transferred to Bosta's Hubs
DELIVERED_TO_SENDER: Order is returned back to the shipper
CANCELLED: Order has been deleted. Please contact the shipper for more info
WAITING_FOR_CUSTOMER_ACTION: Order is rescheduled as you were not reachable on the phone
